articles.description: Saurabh Chaudhary and Manu Bhaker failed to qualify for the medal rounds in 10m Air Pistol Mixed Team event after topping the Qualification Stage 1 in Tokyo on Tuesday. Abhishek Verma and Yashaswini Deswal’s campaign ended early.
